ygData.subject: Re: Rubicite
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t see why a cleric could NOT wear Rubicite... After all, we are (according to Verant) allowed to wear PLATE are we not? Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric
ygData.messageBody:
I don't see why a cleric could NOT wear Rubicite... After all, we are
(according to Verant) allowed to wear PLATE are we not?

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



----- Original Message -----
From: William Hooker <wahooker@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 4:27 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] Rubicite


> From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
>
> You mean clerics won't be able to wear rubicite? that bites. I know that
> we aren't tanks, but It's pretty often I have to hold my own after a few
> heals too many.
>
> Meddik
>
